title: MkdirAll race condition
body:
I've looked at fixing this, but there are a few tricky corner cases, e.g., a file and a
directory of the same name are created after the initial stats return ENOENT.

What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://groups.google.com/group/golang-dev/browse_thread/thread/842e43f34f13353b

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

tip
